wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Simpson (24 November 1924 – 16 June 2008) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a half back for Notts County, Southampton and Shrewsbury Town in the 1950s.

response: In November 1952, he was transferred to Notts County as part of the deal that brought Alex Simpson to The Dell. During his Southampton career, he played a total of 85 games, scoring 16 goals.
